file_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-scheduler.yaml exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-scheduler.yaml exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml exists and is owned by 0:0 and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /var/lib/etcd exists and has permissions rwx------ and does not have permissions ---rwxrwx
Ensure at least one file named /var/lib/etcd exists and is owned by 420:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/admin.conf exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/admin.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/controller-manager.conf exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/controller-manager.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/pki/ exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/pki/*.crt exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/pki/*.key exists and has permissions rw------- and does not have permissions --xrwxrwx

Ensure at least one file named $kubeproxy_config exists and is owned by 0:0 root

Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/kubelet.conf exists and is owned by 0:0

textfilecontent54_object.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS=.+--anonymous-auth=false.+$
Ensure at least one file named $kubelet_config_yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS=.+--anonymous-auth=false.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_AUTHZ_ARGS=.+--authorization-mode=Webhook.+$
Ensure at least one file named $kubelet_config_yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_AUTHZ_ARGS=.+--authorization-mode=Webhook.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_AUTHZ_ARGS.+--client-ca-file=.+$
Ensure at least one file named $kubelet_config_yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_AUTHZ_ARGS.+--client-ca-file=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.+--streaming-connection-idle-timeout=0.+$
Ensure at least one file named $kubelet_config_yaml exists and does not match pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.+--streaming-connection-idle-timeout=0.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.+--protect-kernel-defaults=true.+$
Ensure at least one file named $kubelet_config_yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.+--protect-kernel-defaults=true.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.--make-iptables-util-chains=true.+$
Ensure at least one file named $kubelet_config_yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.--make-iptables-util-chains=true.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and does not match pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.+--hostname-override.+$
Ensure at least one file named $kubelet_config_yaml exists and does not match pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.+--hostname-override.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_CERTIFICATE_ARGS.+--rotate-certificates=true.+$
Verify at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_.+CERTIFICATE_ARGS.+--feature-gates=RotateKubeletServerCertificate=true.+$

Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*--tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS
